trans-unit.source: 1. Installation
trans-unit.target: 1.安装

trans-unit.source: 1.1 Pypi:
trans-unit.target: 1.1 Pypi:

trans-unit.source: 1.2 Github:
trans-unit.target: 1.2 Github。

trans-unit.source: 2. Usage:
trans-unit.target: 2.用法。

trans-unit.source: 2.1 Interactive in Python
trans-unit.target: 2.1 Python中的交互式

trans-unit.source: 2.2 From the terminal
trans-unit.target: 2.2 从终端

trans-unit.source: filediffs takes two files and separates them into
trans-unit.target: filediffs 接收两个文件并将它们分成

trans-unit.source: Code inspired by https://www.splinter.com.au/reconcilingcomparing-huge-data-sets-with-c/ and implemented using Cython
trans-unit.target: 受https://www.splinter.com.au/reconcilingcomparing-huge-data-sets-with-c/启发 并使用Cython实现的代码

trans-unit.source: Currently, only wheels for Linux are build using manylinux.
trans-unit.target: 当前，仅使用manylinux构建用于Linux的轮子。

trans-unit.source: For Dependency management, Pipenv is used.
trans-unit.target: 对于依赖关系管理，使用Pipenv。

trans-unit.source: If the output arguments are not passed to the function, the output will be saved into the working directory.
trans-unit.target: 如果输出参数没有传递给函数,则输出将被保存到工作目录中。

trans-unit.source: In addition, three optional output arguments can be passed to the functions, defining the output files.
trans-unit.target: 此外,还可以向函数传递三个可选的输出参数,定义输出文件。

trans-unit.source: Lines found in both files are not kept in memory but written to disk every 5.000.000 lines to preserve memory.
trans-unit.target: 在这两个文件中发现的行并不保存在内存中,而是每隔5.000.000行写入磁盘以保存内存。

trans-unit.source: On other OS, please install the package as described in the following section.
trans-unit.target: 在其他操作系统上,请按照下面的内容安装软件包。

trans-unit.source: Separate two files into three files, each containing lines observed in both files/first file only/second file only. Programmed using Cython.
trans-unit.target: 将两个文件分离成三个文件,每个文件都包含两个文件中观察到的行数/仅第一文件/仅第二文件。使用Cython编程。

trans-unit.source: The file_diffs function requires two arguments, filename_1 and filename_2, with the path to the files you wish to compare.
trans-unit.target: 该 file_diffs 功能需要两个参数， filename_1 和 filename_2 ，与路径要比较的文件。

trans-unit.source: The filediffs package
trans-unit.target: 该 filediffs 包

trans-unit.source: The filediffs package comes with a build in command line interface. This way it can be used to separate files from the terminal:
trans-unit.target: 所述 filediffs 包带有在命令行界面构建。这样，它可以用于从终端分离文件：

trans-unit.source: The Pipfile defines the python version and package requirements.
trans-unit.target: Pipfile定义了python的版本和软件包要求。

trans-unit.source: The cpp files can be build using pipenv run python setup.py build_ext --inplace.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用以下命令构建cpp文件 pipenv run python setup.py build_ext --inplace 。

trans-unit.source: The file setup.py defines the cython build process.
trans-unit.target: 文件 setup.py 定义了cython构建过程。

trans-unit.source: This way, even very large files can be separated. Only the diff has to fit in memory.
trans-unit.target: 这样一来,即使是非常大的文件也可以被分开。只有差值必须放在内存中。

trans-unit.source: You can clone the package from Github and transpile the Cython code to C++ on your machine.
trans-unit.target: 你可以从Github上克隆这个包,然后把Cython代码移植到你的机器上。

trans-unit.source: You can create a virtual environment for the package with Pipenv by
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用Pipenv为软件包创建一个虚拟环境,方法是

trans-unit.source: calling pipenv install to install from Pipfile.lock
trans-unit.target: 调用 pipenv install install从Pipfile.lock安装

trans-unit.source: filediffs is available on pypi and can therefore be installed via pip
trans-unit.target: filediffs在pypi上可用，因此可以通过pip安装

trans-unit.source: installing pipenv pip install pipenv
trans-unit.target: 安装pipenv pip install pipenv

trans-unit.source: lines found in both files
trans-unit.target: 两档

trans-unit.source: lines found only in file 1
trans-unit.target: 只在文件1中找到的行

trans-unit.source: lines found only in file 2
trans-unit.target: 只在文件2中找到的行
